sentences.en: Blood vessels in the lungs are filled and distend. Capillary changes have been observed in the animal model of simulated microgravity.
sentences.cn: 肺血管充盈、扩张，并在模拟微重力动物模型中观察到肺微血管损伤。

sentences.en: Conclusion:Nifedipine could distend ophthalmic artery and has similar function on other micro-cerebral vessels.
sentences.cn: 结论：硝苯地平可扩张眼动脉，对脑部其它小动脉可能有相似作用。

sentences.en: The patients were asked to micturate to distend the urethra.
sentences.cn: 采用患者自行排尿方法充盈尿道.

sentences.en: The primary role of AM is to distend blood vessel and decrease blood pressure, and it can also restrain the migration of vessel smooth muscle cells.
sentences.cn: AM在休克发生发展过程的作用主要是扩张血管，降低血压，还具有抑制血管平滑肌细胞迁移等作用。

sentences.en: Through this incision, the abdominal cavity is distended with carbon dioxide gas.
sentences.cn: 通过此切口，二氧化碳气体把胸腔充得肿胀起来。

sentences.en: Your aches, distend pains are normal during treatment.
sentences.cn: 你的疼痛, 扩大肛痛在治疗期间是常态.

trans.tran_en: to swell or make something swell because of pressure from inside
